synopsis.text: Mouse, bear, dog, and fox join Jack, a spirited young boy, on a thrilling forest adventure. Their journey takes a turn for the unexpected when a helicopter-riding enchantress challenges Jack to a race. Upon winning, the enchantress, revealed to be a witch, whisks Jack away to her queen's castle with a sinister plan in mind. The queen, a powerful sorceress, aims to transform innocent beings into wicked harpies. Jack and his loyal animal friends must now face the sorceress and her minions, determined to thwart her evil scheme and save themselves from a bewitched fate.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
